item.description:
Let's 'Eat Better...Live Better' Vlora style

Fresh North Mediterranean food prepared simply in a simple yet elegant setting.

Note...restaurant is garden level so may not be easily visible. Look for GNC and then look below it..voila.

Check out Vlora menu

MBTA:

Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to plan your public transportation route five (5) minute walk from Green Line Copley Square or Green Line Arlington or Orange Line Back Bay

DRIVING DIRECTIONS:

Check out Google to plan your route.

Enter Boylston Street from Dartmouth Street.

Both streets are one ways.

Parking is on Boylston St., Clarendon St., and Newbury St.

PARKING:

Check out Best Parking or POVO or Parking Carma for nearby parking garages.

Before I list the Reservation Rules, please understand the NO-SHOW policy was established to ensure everyone who wants to join can and it will be fairly and strictly enforced.

I want to assure you I do understand if you've RSVPd YES and you have a sudden change of plans because you're lost, you don't feel well, you have transportation issues, you don't have the money, you just don't want to be around people...whatever the reason is, my only request is for you to let me know as soon as possible so we don't worry about you and our reservation is adjusted.

As long as you contact me you will not be considered a NO-SHOW.

Rules for Events with Reservations:

If it is less than an hour from the meetup and you are not able to attend or are running late, you MUST call or text me at (617) 445-7549

Please be considerate of your fellow diners time by arriving promptly.

Please bring enough cash to pay for your meal, drinks, tip, and tax.

All RSVPs are on a first reply, first reserved basis.

You may only RSVP YES or NO and WAIT LIST if meetup is full. Maybe isn't an option.

If you RSVP YES or WAIT LIST, you MUST answer the question which appears after your RSVP. If you don't your RSVP will be changed to NO.

If the meetup is full and you wish to attend, please select WAIT LIST RSVP. When a spot opens, your RSVP will be changed to YES based on the time of your WAIT LIST RSVP.

Please RSVP YES only if you are certain you will attend.

If you're not sure you can attend because you have other unconfirmed plans or uncertain transportation, please RSVP NO with a comment.

If your name appears on the event page as a YES after the meetup and you have not attended nor contacted me, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If I change your RSVP to NO because you haven't replied to final update meetup confirmation email deadline, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If any guests you've RSVPd for NO-SHOW, each will count as if you've NO-SHOWED.

If you change your RSVP from a YES to a NO within an hour of the meetup, it is counted as a NO-SHOW if you do not contact me.

If you are a NO-SHOW for three events with reservations you are removed from the group.

NO-SHOWS impact everyone; from you, who could or has been on the wait list to the organizer as well as the restaurant's who staff based on our reservation.

An email from you explaining your absence is an expected courtesy.

If you are removed and there were extenuating circumstances, please email Tonya about rejoining.

Your feedback is appreciated so please, rate the event and venue by completing the survey afterward.

I will arrive at 5:45 PM to confirm seating and will welcome you at the bar.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Tonya/Meetup reservation or call/text my cell (617) 445 7549

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Vlora Dinner - Sunday November 13th 5:45 PM
